title: Scott Hilton to Present Visiting Artist Lecture (University of Arkansas)
text: ( Source : University of Arkansas ) Scott Hilton The Department of Art continues its visiting artist lecture series with photographer Scott Hilton at 5:30 p.m. Thursday, Oct. 15, in Hillside Auditorium Room 206. Scott Hilton is a senior
